thread.title: Wall Street sinks on rate worries

title: Wall Street sinks on rate worries
text:
Wall Street sinks on rate worries 3:52am IST - 01:16 
U.S. stocks suffered their biggest daily drops since the selloff three weeks ago after comments from Fed Chairman Jerome Powell revived fears about more interest rate increases than expected this year. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
